author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

Attempt to fix a build failure in gcc10, and after that to make workflows to run.

#### PR validation:

Building `CUDADataFormats/BeamSpot` succeeds (i.e. gets skipped) on gcc10.
title: [RFC] Make BeamSpotToCUDA constructible, and avoid building CUDADataFormats/BeamSpot when CUDA is not available according to cuda-gcc-support
